item1.name: WILD FOREST JOURNEY
item1.desc: Hike through untouched forests, breathe the fresh air, and reconnect with nature’s serenity.

item2.name: RIVER ESCAPE
item2.desc: Paddle along tranquil rivers, where every stroke brings you closer to nature’s heartbeat.

item3.name: WATERFALL WANDER
item3.desc: Discover hidden waterfalls and embrace the beauty of sustainable exploration.

item4.name: ECO BIKE ADVENTURE
item4.desc: Cycle through rolling hills, leaving only footprints and taking only memories.

item5.name: STARLIT CAMPING
item5.desc: Camp under the stars in eco-friendly sites, where nature is your only host.

item6.name: COASTAL GREEN TRAIL
item6.desc: Explore coastal trails with minimal impact, preserving the ocean’s beauty for generations.

item7.name: COMMUNITY ECO TOUR
item7.desc: Join local communities in sustainable travel, learning their ways to protect the earth.
